content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why was an agreement not reached?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The agreement was not reached because we could not agree on a rental price for the apartment. My offer was 650 euros, while the landlord was seeking a price of at least 750 euros.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 8.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The question seems to be phrased incorrectly, but to answer the intended question, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang
